data.lyric:
[ti:Supalonely (Explicit)]
[ar:BENEE/Gus Dapperton]
[al:STELLA & STEVE (Explicit)]

[00:00.00]Supalonely (Explicit) - BENEE/Gus Dapperton
[00:02.28]Lyrics by：Josh Fountain/Brendan Patrick Rice/Stella Rose Bennett/Jenna Andrews
[00:04.57]Composed by：Josh Fountain/Brendan Patrick Rice/Stella Rose Bennett/Jenna Andrews
[00:06.86]I know I f**ked up I'm just a loser
[00:10.48]Shouldn't be with ya guess I'm a quitter
[00:14.02]But you're out there drinkin' I'm just here thinkin'
[00:17.76]'Bout where I should've been
[00:20.24]I've been lonely mm ah yeah
[00:22.56]Water pouring down from the ceiling
[00:25.40]I knew this would happen still hard to believe it
[00:29.11]Maybe I'm dramatic I don't wanna seem it
[00:32.85]I don't wanna panic
[00:37.20]I'm a sad girl in this big world
[00:40.70]It's a mad world ooh ooh ooh
[00:44.51]All of my friends know what's happened you're a bad thing ah
[00:51.44]I know I f**ked up I'm just a loser
[00:55.13]Shouldn't be with ya guess I'm a quitter
[00:58.64]But you're out there drinkin' I'm just here thinkin'
[01:02.37]'Bout where I should've been
[01:04.90]I've been lonely mm ah yeah
[01:07.27]La-la-la-la la-la-la-la
[01:10.99]Lonely I'm a lonely b***h
[01:14.72]La-la-la-la la-la-la-la
[01:18.42]Lonely super lonely
[01:22.13]Now I'm in the bathtub cryin'
[01:24.93]Think I'm slowly sinking bubbles in my eyes
[01:28.24]Now maybe I'm just dreamin'
[01:30.49]Now I'm in the sad club just tryna get a backrub lonely
[01:36.52]I'm a sad girl in this big world
[01:40.32]It's a mad world
[01:43.99]All of my friends know what's happened you're a bad thing
[01:51.14]I know I f**ked up I'm just a loser
[01:54.67]Shouldn't be with ya guess I'm a quitter
[01:58.10]While you're out there drinkin' I'm just here thinkin'
[02:01.87]'Bout where I should've been
[02:04.50]I've been lonely mm ah yeah
[02:06.79]La-la-la-la woo la-la-la-la
[02:10.60]Lonely I'm a lonely b***h
[02:14.26]La-la-la-la la-la-la-la
[02:17.94]Lonely super lonely
[02:22.36]I loathe romancing in itself I'll be d**ned to try
[02:29.65]I'm only dancin' by myself so I don't slam my Irish buck
[02:37.56]Compostable cups B-B-BENEE I-I can't stress this enough
[02:43.05]I would hate to mess things
[02:45.87]Up but my boogie still stays restless as f**k
[02:50.52]I know I f**ked up I'm just a loser
[02:54.16]Shouldn't be with ya guess I'm a quitter
[02:57.71]But you're out there drinkin' I'm just here thinkin'
[03:01.44]'Bout where I should've been
[03:03.98]I've been lonely mm ah yeah
[03:06.28]La-la-la-la la-la-la-la la la-la-la la-la-la la-la
[03:10.57]Lonely I'm a lonely b***h la la-la-la la-la-la la-la
[03:16.45]La-la-la
[03:17.49]Lonely super lonely
[03:21.20]La-la-la-la la-la-la-la I've been lonely
[03:25.02]Lonely
[03:26.34]I've been lonely by the way
[03:28.67]La-la-la-la la-la-la-la la la-la-la la-la
[03:32.27]Lonely I've been lonely
data.trans:
[ti:Supalonely (Explicit)]
[ar:BENEE/Gus Dapperton]
[al:STELLA & STEVE (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.28]//
[00:04.57]//
[00:06.86]知道我搞砸了 我就是个失败者
[00:10.48]不该和你在一起 因为我是个懦夫
[00:14.02]你在外面买醉 我在这儿沉思
[00:17.76]究竟该何去何从
[00:20.24]我一直都很孤单
[00:22.56]水从天花板上倾泻而下
[00:25.40]早已预料到一切的发生 但仍不敢相信
[00:29.11]也许是我太激动 但不想装作无事发生的样子
[00:32.85]我也不想惊慌失措
[00:37.20]我只是这偌大的世界里 一个黯然神伤的人罢了
[00:40.70]这是个疯狂的世界
[00:44.51]我的朋友都知道发生了什么 你就是我的劫数
[00:51.44]知道我搞砸了 我就是个失败者
[00:55.13]不该和你在一起 因为我是个懦夫
[00:58.64]你在外面买醉 我在这儿沉思
[01:02.37]究竟该何去何从
[01:04.90]我一直都很孤单
[01:07.27]//
[01:10.99]很孤单 我是个孤单的人
[01:14.72]//
[01:18.42]我很孤单
[01:22.13]此时的我坐在浴缸里哭泣
[01:24.93]渐渐被水淹没 眼里进了泡沫
[01:28.24]也许我只是在做梦吧
[01:30.49]走进这个忧伤的俱乐部 试图得到一点安慰 但却于事无补
[01:36.52]毕竟我只是这偌大的世界里 一个黯然神伤的人罢了
[01:40.32]这是个疯狂的世界
[01:43.99]我的朋友都知道发生了什么 你就是我的劫数
[01:51.14]知道我搞砸了 我就是个失败者
[01:54.67]不该和你在一起 因为我是个懦夫
[01:58.10]你在外面买醉 我在这儿沉思
[02:01.87]究竟该何去何从
[02:04.50]我一直都很孤单
[02:06.79]//
[02:10.60]很孤单 我是个孤单的人
[02:14.26]//
[02:17.94]我很孤单
[02:22.36]我讨厌爱情 它只会让我被诅咒
[02:29.65]一个人舞动着 所以才不会沉迷酒精
[02:37.56]一定要用环保的杯子 
[02:43.05]讨厌把事情搞砸
[02:45.87]但连舞蹈也掩盖不住我的焦躁不安
[02:50.52]知道我搞砸了 我就是个失败者
[02:54.16]就不该和你在一起 因为我是个懦夫
[02:57.71]你在外面买醉 我在这儿沉思
[03:01.44]究竟该何去何从
[03:03.98]我一直都很孤单
[03:06.28]//
[03:10.57]很孤单 我是个孤单的人
[03:16.45]//
[03:17.49]我很孤单
[03:21.20]我一直都很孤单
[03:25.02]很孤单
[03:26.34]就是随口一提 我真的很孤单
[03:28.67]//
